CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that webkit css region styling can be parsed correctly. Test passes if it doesn't crash.

color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
    #ff0000 - #p1 <style>…</style>
display: block;
    block - p user agent stylesheet
margin-block-end: 16px;
    1em - p user agent stylesheet
margin-block-start: 16px;
    1em - p user agent stylesheet
margin-inline-end: 0px;
    0px - p user agent stylesheet
margin-inline-start: 0px;
    0px - p user agent stylesheet
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

#p1 { (<style>…</style>)
    color: #ff0000;

[expanded] 
p { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
    margin-block-start: 1em;
    margin-block-end: 1em;
    margin-inline-start: 0px;
    margin-inline-end: 0px;
